scripts.start: npm run helm-package-and-index && npm run mkdocs-serve
scripts.helm-repo-index: helm repo index --url https://alexdresko.github.io/helm-charts/ --merge index.yaml . && cp index.yaml pages/_data/index.yaml
scripts.helm-package-and-index: npm run helm-package && npm run helm-repo-index && cp index.yaml docs/index.yaml
